PageTitle: display mpls te gmpls tunnel path
FuncDef: The display mpls te gmpls tunnel path command displays GMPLS UNI tunnel path information.
CLIs: display mpls te gmpls tunnel path [ tunnel-name <tunnel-name> ] [ lsp-id <ingress-lsr-id> <session-id> lsp-id ]
display mpls te gmpls tunnel path lsr-role { ingress | egress }

ParaDef.Info:
Displays path information about a GMPLS UNI tunnel with a specified name.
-

Displays GMPLS UNI tunnel path information with a specified LSP ID.
-

Displays GMPLS UNI tunnel path information with a specified LSR role.
-

Displays path information about a GMLPS UNI tunnel on which a local device functions as the ingress.
-

Displays path information about a GMLPS UNI tunnel on which a local device functions as the egress.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls te gmpls tunnel path
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view GMPLS UNI tunnel path information, run the display mpls te gmpls tunnel path command. The command output helps check whether the path of a GMPLS UNI tunnel meets the requirement of a network plan.
